005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.IDocumentNodeItem;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IResourceResolver;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IUriResolver;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
012
013import java.io.File;
014import java.io.IOException;
015import java.net.URI;
016import java.net.URISyntaxException;
017import java.net.URL;
018import java.nio.file.Path;
019
020import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
021
022/**
023 * Supports loading documents referenced in Metapath expressions.
024 */
025public interface IDocumentLoader extends IResourceResolver {
026  /**
027   * Allows setting an {@link IUriResolver}, which will be used to map URIs prior
028   * to loading the resource.
029   *
030   * @param resolver
031   *          the resolver to set
032   */
033  void setUriResolver(@NonNull IUriResolver resolver);
034
035  /**
036   * Load a Metaschema-based document from a file resource.
037   *
038   * @param file
039   *          the file to load
040   * @return a document item representing the contents of the document.
041   * @throws IOException
042   *           if an error occurred while parsing the file
043   */
044  @NonNull
045  default IDocumentNodeItem loadAsNodeItem(@NonNull File file) throws IOException {
046    return loadAsNodeItem(ObjectUtils.notNull(file.toPath()));
047  }
048
049  /**
050   * Load a Metaschema-based document from a file resource identified by a path.
051   *
052   * @param path
053   *          the file to load
054   * @return a document item representing the contents of the document.
055   * @throws IOException
056   *           if an error occurred while parsing the file
057   */
058  @NonNull
059  default IDocumentNodeItem loadAsNodeItem(@NonNull Path path) throws IOException {
060    return loadAsNodeItem(ObjectUtils.notNull(path.toUri()));
061  }
062
063  /**
064   * Load a Metaschema-based document from a URL resource.
065   *
066   * @param url
067   *          the resource to load
068   * @return a document item representing the contents of the document.
069   * @throws IOException
070   *           if an error occurred while parsing the resource
071   * @throws URISyntaxException
072   *           if the URL is not a valid URI
073   */
074  @NonNull
075  default IDocumentNodeItem loadAsNodeItem(@NonNull URL url) throws IOException, URISyntaxException {
076    return loadAsNodeItem(ObjectUtils.notNull(url.toURI()));
077  }
078
079  /**
080   * Load a Metaschema-based document from a URI resource.
081   * <p>
082   * This is the expected, primary entry point for implementations.
083   *
084   * @param uri
085   *          the resource to load
086   * @return a document item representing the contents of the document.
087   * @throws IOException
088   *           if an error occurred while parsing the resource
089   */
090  @NonNull
091  IDocumentNodeItem loadAsNodeItem(@NonNull URI uri) throws IOException;
092}
